state.text: Which state do you farm in? Please say your state name after the beep.

owns_land.text: Do you own the land you farm on? Press 1 for Yes, Press 2 for No.

land_size.text: How much land do you farm in acres? Please say the number after the beep.

farming_type.text: What do you grow? Please say your crop or activity after the beep.

irrigation.text: How do you irrigate your crops? Press 1 for Canal, Press 2 for Borewell or Tubewell, Press 3 for Rainfed, Press 4 for Drip or Sprinkler.

activity.text: What is your primary farming activity? Please say it after the beep.

income.text: What is your approximate annual income from all sources? Please say the amount after the beep.

category.text: Do you belong to any of these categories? Press 1 for SC or ST, Press 2 for Woman farmer, Press 3 for None.
